entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a 12-year-old boy who is being scolded by Professor McGonagall. He is described as having 'about as much experience' as a 12-year-old.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and is also being scolded by Professor McGonagall. He is described as having a 'murderous' look on his face.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is Filch's cat who appears round the corner and breaks the tension between Harry and Ron.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a teacher at Hogwarts who has a cat named Mrs Norris. His shuffling feet are heard by Harry and Ron.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Ron's sister who is kissing Dean. Harry has an image of himself kissing Ginny instead.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as evidenced by their interaction in the corridor.
Harry has a romantic interest in Ginny, as shown by his image of himself kissing her.
